00043 class tx_servicemgr_pi1 extends tx_servicemgr {
00044     var $prefixId      = 'tx_servicemgr_pi1';       // Same as class name
00045     var $scriptRelPath = 'pi1/class.tx_servicemgr_pi1.php'; // Path to this script relative to the extension dir.
00046     var $extKey        = 'servicemgr';  // The extension key.
00047     var $pi_checkCHash = true;
00048     var $template;
00049 
00050 
00058     function main($content,$conf)   {
00059         $this->conf=$conf;
00060         $this->pi_setPiVarDefaults();
00061 
00062         $this->tx_init();
00063         $this->tx_loadLL();
00064         
00065         $this->fetchConfigValue('previewdays');
00066         $this->fetchConfigValue('shownelements');
00067         $this->fetchConfigValue('upcoming');
00068         $this->fetchConfigValue('previewcolumns');
00069         $this->fetchConfigValue('detailviewPID');
00070 
00071         //DEBUG-CONFIG
00072         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->debugOutput = true;
00073         
00074         
00075         $this->piVars['eventId'] = intVal($this->piVars['eventId']);
00076 
00077         
00078         if (empty($this->piVars['eventId'])) {
00079             $content = $this->listView();
00080         } else {
00081             $this->piVars['backlink'] = intVal($this->piVars['backlink']);
00082             if (!t3lib_div::testInt($this->piVars['backlink']) || $this->piVars['backlink'] == 0) {
00083                  $this->piVars['backlink'] = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id;
00084             }
00085             
00086             $content= $this->detailViewEvent(
00087                 $this->piVars['eventId'],
00088                 array(
00089                     'subparts' => array('subject','datetime','series','notes','sermon','backlink'),
00090                     'backlink' => array('str' => $this->pi_getLL('back'), 'id' => $this->piVars['backlink']),
00091                 ),
00092                 $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->cObj->fileResource('EXT:servicemgr/res/esv.html'), '###SINGLEEVENTEL###')
00093             );
00094         }
00095         return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00096     }
00097 
00103     function listView() {
00104 
00105         //Template preparation
00106         $subpart = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template,'###PREVIEWLIST###');
00107         $headerrow = $this->cObj->getSubpart($subpart,'###HEADERROW###');
00108         $singlerow = $this->cObj->getSubpart($subpart,'###ROW###');
00109 
00110         if (empty($this->conf['previewcolumns'])) {
00111             $cols = array('date','subject','notes');
00112         } else {
00113             $cols = split(',',$this->conf['previewcolumns']);
00114         }
00115         
00116         $colHeaders = '';
00117         $colHeader = $this->cObj->getSubpart($headerrow,'###LABEL###');
00118         foreach ($cols as $col) {
00119             $colHeaders .= $this->cObj->substituteMarker($colHeader,'###H_LABEL###',$this->pi_getLL($col));
00120         }
00121         $subpartArray['###HEADERROW###'] = $this->cObj->substituteSubpart($headerrow,'###LABEL###',$colHeaders);
00122         
00123         if($this->conf['shownelements'] != 0) {
00124             $limit = '0,'.intval($this->conf['shownelements']);
00125         }
00126         if($this->conf['upcoming'] == 1) {
00127             $d = mktime(0,0,1);
00128             $andWhere = ' AND datetime>'.$d;
00129         }
00130         if (!$this->conf['detailviewPID']) {
00131             $this->conf['detailviewPID'] = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id;
00132         }
00133                 
00134         //get content from database
00135         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00136             'uid, datetime, subject, notes',   #select
00137             'tx_servicemgr_events', #from
00138             'hidden=0 AND deleted=0'.$andWhere,  #where
00139             $groupBy='',
00140             'datetime',
00141             $limit
00142         );
00143 
00144 
00145         //substitue table rows in template
00146         if ($res) {
00147             $colValue = $this->cObj->getSubpart($singlerow,'###VALUE###');
00148             while ($row=$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00149                 $markerArray['date'] = date('d.m.Y', $row['datetime']);
00150 
00151                 //create link to sermon archive?
00152                 if ($this->generalConf['SermonArchivePID']) {
00153                     $markerArray['subject'] = $this->tx_linkToPage(
00154                         $row['subject'],
00155                         $this->conf['detailviewPID'],
00156                         array(
00157                             'tx_servicemgr_pi1[eventId]' => $row['uid'],
00158                             'tx_servicemgr_pi1[backlink]' => $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00159                         )
00160                     );
00161                 } else {
00162                     $markerArray['subject'] = $row['subject'];
00163                 }
00164 
00165                 $markerArray['notes'] = $row['notes'];
00166                 
00167                 $rowContent = '';
00168                 foreach ($cols as $col) {
00169                     $rowContent .= $this->cObj->substituteMarker($colValue,'###H_VALUE###',$markerArray[$col]);
00170                 }
00171                 
00172                 $liste .= $this->cObj->substituteSubpart($singlerow,'###VALUE###',$rowContent);
00173             }
00174             $subpartArray['###ROW###']=$liste;
00175         }
00176 
00177         return $this->substituteMarkersAndSubparts($subpart,array(),$subpartArray);
00178     }
00179 }
